newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Dec 15.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Dec 15.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat praises King Fahd of Saudi Arabia for unwavering support to the Palestinian cause.
- Corrosion in Saudi Arabia causes industrial losses worth 19.4 billion riyals a year, official says.
- Egyptian delegation headed by industry and mineral resources minister to seek investment opportunities in Saudi.
- Small scale industrial projects to be financed by Riyadh Chamber of Commerce and United Saudi Commercial Bank.
- Up to $40 billion is needed to develop water infrastructure in the Middle East, expert says.
